thread.title: Operations Coordinator - Sports Park - Sports Marketing
thread.title_full: Operations Coordinator - Sports Park - Sports Marketing

title: Operations Coordinator - Sports Park - Sports Marketing
text: Facility management responsibilities to include identifying and reducing risks, park beautification and waste management. Assist with execution of major events and tournaments   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
